Description: Stops training if validation loss does not improve for 20 epochs to prevent overfitting.
Saves the best model (based on validation loss) to 'best_model.h5'.
Logs training/validation metrics and model architecture to TensorBoard.
Reduces learning rate by 0.2 if validation loss does not improve for 10 epochs, with a minimum of 1e-6.
Logs training/validation metrics to 'training.log' CSV file.
Reduces learning rate by 0.9 every 10 epochs during training.
